item.title: Using JS Auth with found cluster
item.description: Using Found by elastic cluster helps a lot to have a ready to use and managed elasticsearch cluster. I started my own cluster yesterday to power brownbaglunch.fr website (work in progress) and it was ready to use after some clicks! It’s a kind of magic! But I ran into an issue when you secure it and use the elasticsearch javascript client. Creating your cluster Found Console Adding ACL By default, your cluster is opened but you can fix that by opening “Access Control” menu.
